title: Base UI Schema
description: Reusable UI schema definitions for all educational activities

UIStateChangeOperation.description: Action parameter as a JSON object

op.description: Operation to perform on the action parameter

items.description: Accepted types for the value (any match is valid)

value_type.description: List of acceptable types for the value (e.g., ["integer", "number"] allows either)

value.description: Value to set for the action parameter (filled by controller before sending, optional in JSON). Can be any type: string, number, boolean, null, object, or array.

UIAction.description: Action configuration for user input components

operations.description: Action parameters (always an array, even for a single parameter)

question.description: The question text to ask the student

answer.description: The answer text to display to the student
